player
Interface IPlayerDataBase

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayerDataBase
public interface IPlayerDataBase

An IPlayerDataBase object keeps track of the current player allowed to play.

Method Summary
 IPlayer getCurrentPlayer()
          Returns the player who is currently allowed to play.
 

Method Detail

getCurrentPlayer

IPlayer getCurrentPlayer()
                         throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Returns the player who is currently allowed to play.

Returns:
the IPlayer who is currently allowed to play.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - When the database is empty.
